headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  NEWBERRY, SAMUEL R.

lead_paragraph: NEWBERRY--Samuel R.,departed peacefully on April 22, 2014 in Queens, NY. He is predeceased by his wife Alberta, parents and 13 siblings. Mr. Newberry came to Jamaica, NY at age 16. He was passionate about his antique shows, and business "Ye Old Treasure Shoppe." View: 10am. Funeral: 11am, May 7, New Apostolic, 9914 Francis Lewis Blvd., Hollis, NY. May his soul rest in perfect peace.
